ActivityMetadata.Name: GH Get a selfhosted runner for a repository
ActivityMetadata.Label: GH Get a selfhosted runner for a repository
ActivityMetadata.Description:
Gets a specific self-hosted runner configured in a repository.
You must authenticate using an access token with the `repo` scope to use this endpoint.
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Github

Get a self-hosted runner for a repository

Gets a specific self-hosted runner configured in a repository. You must authenticate using an access token with the `repo` scope to use this endpoint.

Method: Get

OperationID: actions/get-self-hosted-runner-for-repo

EndPoint:

/repos/{owner}/{repo}/actions/runners/{runner_id}
